09-26-2024: - Removed reason 31 of why {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash is better than {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop and replaced it with reason 26 of why {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash is better than {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop (fixed a bug with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash's hero select lines)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.08 to 0.06
09-14-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam cooldown increased from 117 to 130
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam T1 reduced from -38s to -30s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam end radius reduced from 5m to 4m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam slow reduced from 40% to 30%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam DPS reduced from 220 to 205
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam DPS spirit scaling reduced from 3 to 2.7
09-12-2024: - Uppercut no longer roots your hero during cast time
- Can now keep firing if he jumps and his laser is already warmed up
- Reverted recent change to make hook have an alternate cast mode to pierce through allies/enemies
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam now does splash damage around a 5m area the beam connects to on the ground (can be used to fish heroes out of cover in some areas)
08-29-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook now only targets enemies when used by default. If you use with alt cast (middle mouse) it will be ally only mode.
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam can now be canceled by using Parry
08-15-2024: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb sometimes misfiring
- Improved visibility of AOE around {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop while casting {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam
- Gun range reduced from 50m to 30m + 2.5m/boon (max of 58m)
- Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
- Base regen increased from 2.5 to 3
- Base Bullet Resist increased from 0% to 10%
- Bullet Resist per boon reduced from 2.5% to 1.6% (same overall bullet resist at max)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook range reduced from 40m to 35m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook T2 increased from +25m to +30m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Exploding Uppercut|Size=20}} Exploding Uppercut now has a slight angle limitation to prevent straight-up direction
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Exploding Uppercut|Size=20}} Exploding Uppercut radius increased from 10m to 14m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Exploding Uppercut|Size=20}} Exploding Uppercut T1 increased from -10s Cooldown to -11s
- Fixed hooking through veils sometimes not working
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb radius increased from 10m to 12m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb can now be cast on self using alt cast hotkey
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam T2 reduced from +140 to +100
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam spirit scaling increased from 2.4 to 3.0
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam turn rate improved by 10%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam nearby radius increased from 4.5m to 5m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam nearby damage now does 25% less than the full amount
08-01-2024: - Bullet Resistance growth per boon increased from 2% to 2.5%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb now prioritizes enemies over allies
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam duration now scales with Spirit (0.08)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam spirit scaling increased from 2.2 to 2.4
07-23-2024: - Fixed a recent issue with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop gun not using lag compensation correctly when hitting orbs
07-18-2024: - Base HP regen increased from 1 to 2.5
- No longer has 24% base bullet resistance
- Now gains +2% Bullet Resistance per boon (happens 11 times)
- Uppercut horizontal distance knockback on enemy heroes is reduced from 25m to 20m
- Fixed enemies being able to use heavy melee to cancel Uppercut's momentum
- Hyperbeam is now very wide in the area right in front of the hero, then narrows into the current size a few meters away
- Hyperbeam Spirit Power damage scaling increased from 1.96 to 2.2
06-27-2024: - Fixed a bug where pinging {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb abilities would call the wrong ability name
06-20-2024: - Fixed the unit target UI not showing up for instant-cast abilities (MoKrill ult, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lady Geist|Size=20}} Lady Geist ult, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop bomb)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook hitbox reduced from 36 inches to 33
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam cooldown increased from 100s to 110s
- {{HeroIcon|Hero=Seven|Size=20}} Seven: {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge now uses the new instant cast option that {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop Bomb uses
06-13-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb base damage reduced from 130 to 120
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook grab radius reduced from 40 inches to 36
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam movement and dash slow increased from 30% to 40%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam DPS increased from 210 to 220
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam tracking speed increased by 10%
06-06-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam slow now affects stamina dashes
05-30-2024: - Base bullet armor increased from 20% to 24%
05-23-2024: - Fixed a few unit target abilities that could sometimes select a target behind a nearby wall (e.g. {{HeroIcon|Hero=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb T3 changed from Silence to Disarm
- Improved {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook hitbox detection to not grab targets that are behind cover
05-16-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb T3 now applies the silence on cast instead of detonation
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb T3 silence duration reduced from 5s to 3.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
05-10-2024: - No longer has an innate +15% Spirit Resist
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook T3 reduced from -15s to -12s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook Return Speed increased from 1800 to 2200
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam DPS increased from 180 to 210
05-03-2024: - Weapon no longer has horizontal/vertical recoil
